database.name: VIEW RV_ASSET_DELIVERY
database.view: SELECT ad.A_Asset_Delivery_ID, ad.AD_Client_ID, ad.AD_Org_ID, ad.IsActive, ad.Created, ad.CreatedBy, ad.Updated, ad.UpdatedBy, a.A_ASSET_ID, a.A_Asset_Group_ID, a.M_Product_ID, a.GUARANTEEDATE, a.ASSETSERVICEDATE, a.C_BPARTNER_ID, ad.AD_USER_ID, ad.MOVEMENTDATE, ad.SERNO, ad.LOT, ad.VERSIONNO, ad.M_INOUTLINE_ID, ad.EMAIL, ad.MESSAGEID, ad.DELIVERYCONFIRMATION, ad.URL, ad.REMOTE_ADDR, ad.REMOTE_HOST, ad.REFERRER, ad.DESCRIPTION FROM A_Asset_Delivery ad INNER JOIN A_Asset a ON (a.A_Asset_ID=ad.A_Asset_ID)
